lead_paragraph: Ordinary Americans who were on the front lines from the Revolution to the Persian Gulf war show themselves to be poets of troubled times in ''War Letters,'' Sunday on PBS. Several shows this weekend have a Veterans Day theme. A Critic's Notebook article by Julie Salamon, Page 26.
abstract: Photo of scene from PBS television program War Letters
